dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified CM as the root cause for VCORE increase and ruled out MMDVFS.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent captured the main causal links but did not explicitly mention the CPU frequencies or SW_REQ2 voting mechanism.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the VCORE and DDR percentages but missed specific CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning is logical and flows well, with MMDVFS correctly ruled out.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested fix is practical but could be more detailed.
